
============================================
IMMANENCE - Backup and Deploy
============================================

BACKUP:
1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

IMMANENCE - Backup and Deploy
============================================

BACKUP:
1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

============================================
IMMANENCE - Backup and Deploy
============================================

BACKUP:
1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.

1. Quick backup (fast local mirror)
2. Snapshot (timestamped immutable backup)
3. GitHub push (remote backup)
4. Deploy to GitHub Pages (public site)
5. All of the above

RESTORE:
6. Restore from quick backup
7. Restore from snapshot (choose which)
8. Restore from GitHub

9. Exit

Select option (1-9): Invalid choice. Try again.
ERROR: Input redirection is not supported, exiting the process immediately.
